overview: One day, a handsome student, Seungmo who is popular among women sees a strange promotion of a massage shop which provides free oil massage for hot guys so he goes there. As it's his first time to take a massage, his body goes heated up with sensual hands of massager, Doohoon. Seungmo is embarrassed and wants to hide his agitated genitals but Doohoon's massage becomes more provocative.
title: The Massage
